name: Shukto

ingredients.name: Sweet potato (Ranga Alu)
ingredients.quantity: 1 no. cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: French Beans (Shim)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: White Radish (Mulo)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Raw Papaya (Kacha Pepe)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Carrot (Gajor)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Pumpkin (Kumro)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Brinjal (Begun)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Bitter Gourd (Karola)
ingredients.quantity: 50 gms cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Raw Banana (Kacha Kala)
ingredients.quantity: 1 no. cut into 1 inch wide Julienne

ingredients.name: Ginger (Ada)
ingredients.quantity: 2 inches ground to a fine paste

ingredients.name: Mustard (Sorshe)
ingredients.quantity: 2 teaspoons ground to a fine paste

steps: Heat oil in a frying pan and fry brinjal till brown and keep aside.
Fry bitter gourd and keep aside.
Fry grated coconut and keep aside.
In the remaining oil fry fenugreek, 1/2 teaspoon mustard for seasoning.
Add drumsticks, pumpkin , french beans, white radish, raw papaya, carrots, raw banana, sweet potato and stirfry till brown.
Add turmeric powder, coriander powder, sugar, salt and some water and cook for a few minutes till the vegtables are tender.
Add brinjal, bitter gourd, coconut and masala vadi and mix thoroughly.
Mix wheat flour, mustard paste, pure ghee in the milk and add to the mixture and blend well.
